content:
Ord. 031211-42.

The platting official is a city or county official who has the duties and powers prescribed
by this title. Whether a city official or a county official acts as the platting official
is determined by Section 30-1-92 (Discretionary Authority).

Source: Based on City Code Chapter 25-1, Article 3 (Accountable Entities); Ord. 031211-11;
